Coconut renders json defined forms in a browser and then saves the results to couchdb.

Download

You can download this project in either zip or tar formats.

You can also clone the project with Git by running: 

$ git clone git://github.com/vetula/Android-Tims-MobileFuton

get the source code on GitHub : vetula/Android-Tims-MobileFuton
